django.contrib.admin.apps
=========================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.admin.apps


Classes

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.admin.apps.SimpleAdminConfig
   django.contrib.admin.apps.AdminConfig


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: SimpleAdminConfig

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.apps.AppConfig`


   Simple AppConfig which does not do automatic discovery.


   .. py:attribute:: default_auto_field
      :value: 'django.db.models.AutoField'



   .. py:attribute:: default_site
      :value: 'django.contrib.admin.sites.AdminSite'



   .. py:attribute:: name
      :value: 'django.contrib.admin'



   .. py:attribute:: verbose_name


   .. py:method:: ready()


.. py:class:: AdminConfig

   Bases: :py:obj:`SimpleAdminConfig`


   The default AppConfig for admin which does autodiscovery.


   .. py:attribute:: default
      :value: True



   .. py:method:: ready()
